name: Disaster Tourist
description:
A short game about a robot going on a relaxing vacation...

Features include:

- Relaxing beach noises

- A chill soundtrack

- Real time dynamic building destruction

- Borgors

Controls:

- WASD to move

- E to interact

- TAB to see objectives

Made during a local Game Jam called the "Scuffed Game Jam".

Made in collaboration with Sisi.

Special thanks to Kenney.
